alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Gasconade; Warren (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 16 at 2:28PM CDT until July 16 at 3:15PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: The National Weather Service in St Louis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Franklin County in east central Missouri... Warren County in east central Missouri... Southeastern Gasconade County in east central Missouri... * Until 315 PM CDT. * At 228 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Treloar to near Owensville, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Washington, Union, Warrenton, Sullivan, Pacific, St. Clair, Wright City, New Haven, Gray Summit, Villa Ridge, Gerald, Marthasville, Truesdale, Innsbrook, Parkway, Rosebud, Miramiguoa Park, Beaufort, Treloar, and Dutzow. This includes the following highways... Interstate 44 in Missouri between exits 225 and 257. Interstate 70 in Missouri between exits 193 and 200. This also includes Robertsville State Park and Meramec State Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
